actions.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Mathias under the authority of the order of Feb  3, 83. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 7.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
S.Res.59 is repealed as a result of the passage of S.Res.76.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Rules and Administration.

summary.text: Authorizes the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration, from March 1, 1983, through February 29, 1984, to: (1) make expenditures from the contingent fund; (2) employ personnel; (3) utilize, on a reimbursable basis, the services of department or agency personnel; and (4) procure consultant services.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Rules and Administration.
